mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE_NO , HOUSE_NAME , HOUSE_ADDRESS , DEPOSIT , RENT , ENTER_DATE , MAX_ENTER_DATE , MIN_STAY , MAX_STAY , ROOM_PEOPLE , INC_FURNITURE , HOUSE_CONTENT , RES_GENDER , RES_TYPE , FLOOR , HOUSE_STATUS , HOUSE_DATE FROM HOUSE ORDER BY HOUSE_DATE DESC
SELECT HOUSE_NO , HOUSE_TITLE , HOUSE_CONTENT , HOUSE_TYPE , HOUSE_DATE , HOUSE_STATUS FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_STATUS = #{category} ORDER BY HOUSE_DATE DESC
SELECT MEMBER_ID, COUNT(*) FROM HOUSE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY MEMBER_ID HAVING HOUSE_COUNT(*) >= 3
SELECT HOUSE_NO , HOUSE_TITLE , HOUSE_CONTENT , HOUSE_TYPE , HOUSE_DATE , HOUSE_STATUS FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOUSE H JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE ${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT HOUSE_NO , HOUSE_TITLE , HOUSE_CONTENT , HOUSE_DATE , HOUSE_STATUS FROM HOUSE JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE ${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY HOUSE_NO DESC
